dialogues.text: (tense, into radio) Bud... we got Lucian Adams...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bud, pulse building to a boil.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into radio) Hold position. Give me a head count.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (filter) Two men flanking. Drivers have not left the cars. Initial perps still on post. Lucian's entering the building...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bud pulls on a KEVLAR VEST, holsters a .45. Extra clips o the waistband. Checks a loaded PUMP SG. Ready.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marandino, fastens on a vest, loads a 12-Gauge, locks. Suddenly, through the side window... A LONE FIGURE, IN A QUARTER TRENCH, MOVES PAST. It happens in a flash. Marandino LOOKS, SEES only a quick profile as the Figure between parked cars and walks across the street...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into radio) I need eyes on a single, white male crossing Esplanade. Possible intent...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cobb looks over his shoulder, SEES the Figure 75 yards aw moving briskly across Esplanade... We still can't see his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bud grabs the rifle, eye on the scope, aims out the windo POV THROUGH THE SCOPE: as the CROSS-HAIRS find the Figure walking. SEE the BODY. Then the FACE... IT'S JESSE.  ON BUD, spinning now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (beat, into radio) It's Jesse...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (quickly, radio filter) He's heading toward the alley, Bud. We take him down?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HEAD - TRACKING - RACK FOCUS... This decision... He HAS t decide... And he does:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let him go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (firm) Let him go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bud, that's crazy! Jesse goes in first, he's gonna blow this whole thing. We can't let that happen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (intense, into radio) That's exactly what we're gonna do! We got no way inside. Let Jesse go in hard and draw fire. He pushes Lucian out to us. Stand the fuck down. I'm on my way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bud throws down the rifle, grabs the pump SG, runs out th door...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marandino, sweeps the alley with his binoculars. No Jesse

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into radio) I don't see him. I got nothin'...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: POV THROUGH BINOCULARS: (PAN UP) to the balcony. MUZZLE FLASHES SUDDENLY IGNITE. Balcony Guard is shot dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fuck!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JESSE STRIDES INTO VIEW. Draws a silenced Tactical .45 an FIRES, putting TWO HARD ROUNDS into Door Guard. Both DRIV get out. Jesse pivots, HAMMERS two rounds to their heads. They drop cold. It happens in seconds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into radio) Shots fired! Shots fired!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bud, charging through a FIRE EXIT, bounding down steps...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over radio) Jesse hit four men! What do you want me to do?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into radio) Call it in! Local and SWAT! Get the place surrounded!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jesse slaps a clay plastique with a DETONATOR onto Tibeda back door, then covers.   There's a loud EXPLOSION as the DOOR BLOWS OPEN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FOLLOW JESSE through billowing smoke, into...

dialogues.speaker: A LONG HALLWAY
dialogues.text: as he pulls a REMINGTON SAWED-OFF, slung on a strap, to h left hand, .45 to his right. Mid-hall, AB #6 looks over, freezes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucian with Kay and Bingham. They HEAR the explosion. Exchange looks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jesse steps over the dead AB #6 without breaking stride. Comes to a door. Kicks it in...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...And Mills FIRES a gun, burning Jesse's ear -- Blood po down his neck -- and Jesse's Tactical FIRES. Mills is HIT IN THE THROAT. He falls into a chair. And hi eyes - at the fierce face of death - are filled with Jess who FIRES TWO ROUNDS. One to the head. That fast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two AB SOLDIERS #7 and #8 hurry in. Lucian, Kay and Bingh stand up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's go. We're gettin' you out of here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All three bosses draw GUNS. Lock and load.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Outside, the sound of gunfire is heard. Jacket turns to t BARKEEP. Alarmed:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give me that fuckin' shotgun!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Barkeep lays a shotgun on the bar. Jacket reaches. When..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (boaring in, 9MM aimed) POLICE! TAKE YOUR HANDS OFF THE GUN! STEP FUCKIN' BACK!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jacket looks at Cobb. Steps back. Hands in the air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bud bursts outside, full throttle. Shouts into the radio:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jam the alley! No one goes in or out!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marandino hits the gas. TIRES SCREECH as he slides sidewa and secures the mouth of the alley. Door kicks out. 12-ga levels.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doorman #1, HEARING the commotion turns... ...SEES INSIDE THE CAFE, Cobb cuffing Jacket and Barkeep. Doorman #1 draws a Para-Ordnance .45, FIRES. A VOLLEY OF

dialogues.speaker: SHOTS SLAM INTO THE CAFE.
dialogues.text: Cobb can't make it through INCOMING FIRE and covers. Remaining PATRONS SCREAM, drop under tables.   Doorman #1 KEEPS FIRING, advancing towards the Cafe, when BOOM! A SHOTGUN BLAST takes his head off -- REVEALING BUD behind him, running toward Tibedaux's.

dialogues.speaker: I/E. TIBEDAUX'S, DOWNSTAIRS
dialogues.text: PATRONS stampede for the door. Lucian, Bingham and Kay wi AB #7 and #8 follow...

dialogues.speaker: OUTSIDE TO THE STREET
dialogues.text: ...and Bud is coming right for them. CLOSE ON LUCIAN. The shock of seeing Bud.  Lucian FIRES. Bud kneels and PUMPS SHOTS - hits AB #7 and #8 - killing Lucian, Kay, Bingham flee back inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jesse yanks off the cover of the main electric panel. He out incoming lines and FIRES into the lighting circuit.

dialogues.speaker: VARIOUS ROOMS INSIDE TIBEDAUX'S
dialogues.text: Fluorescent units explode, plunging us into DARKNESS. Arc SPUTTER and FLARE, the corridors now strobe-lit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cobb runs out of the cafe, pushing through civilians.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Down! Get down!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bud pursues Lucian...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay on the door! I'm goin' in!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bud enters- Split-second and DOORMAN #2 OPENS FIRE from the waiter's entrance. Bud drops and FIRES BACK. Doorman #2 goes down. Bud runs across overturned tables and up a STAIRWELL...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jesse emerges. AB #9 steps out, FIRES. The bullet hits Jesse's vest, knocking him backwards. Jesse levels the sawed-off. FIRES. AB #9 falls in a heap. Jesse rises, keeps moving...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MOVING WITH BUD entering, KICKING down doors, sweeping ro with his shotgun... No sign of Lucian.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jesse is coming...  ...and the SLAUGHTER BUILDS.  He throws open a door to a BAR AREA.   AB #10 and #11 FIRE SMGs WILDLY, running from the room. J UNLOADS the sawed-off. MISSING. Plaster throws and crumbl A GUNSHOT rips through Jesse's left arm. The sawed-off dr to his side. Jesse turns - EDGAR BINGHAM is FIRING a SERV REVOLVER - SHOTS MISS as Jesse dives behind the bar. HAROLD KAY is moving down the stairwell. FIRING an Automa wildly. Bottles and glasses explode. Bingham keeps firing. Mirrors SHATTER.

dialogues.speaker: BEHIND THE BAR
dialogues.text: bullets splinter wood, Jesse slams another magazine into .45. Above him, strays catch lights, glass filaments EXPL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bud KICKS down a door. AB #12 charges out. Grabs for Bud. who breaks the grab, pulls AB #12's neck down, slams his into his forehead twice, knocked cold. Grabs his gun.

dialogues.speaker: A HALLWAY DOOR SWINGS OPEN
dialogues.text: AB #13 emerges, HAMMERING GUNSHOTS. Bud covers. SHOTS BLO HOLES in the wall.

dialogues.speaker: A SECOND DOOR OPENS
dialogues.text: ...and AB #14 steps out, draws. Bud throws him in the way CROSS-FIRE. AB #13 takes AB #14's SHOTS.  Bud aims past. FIRES ONCE. AB #14 is hit dead center and drops like an oak. Both men dead. That fast, and Bud is on the move...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AB #10 and #11 run out and swing their SMGs, FIRING onto alley and KILLING MARANDINO... Then charging to the front COBB FIRES. AB #10 is BLOWN APART, as AB #11 FIRES back, hitting Cobb in the vest. His ribs broken, he sits down stunned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into radio) I'm hit. I'm fuckin' hit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AB #11 running past as several BLACK AND WHITES now arriv TAKE AND RETURN FIRE -- AB #11 is shot dead. Police shouting. Civilians running, as...

dialogues.speaker: GUNFIGHT ENSUES.
dialogues.text: Jesse rises over the bar, FIRING BURSTS into Kay, who tum down the stairwell like a rag doll.  Bingham shoots Jesse in the hip. He staggers, then falls rolls to his back...  Bingham rounds the bar just as Jesse, somehow, lifts the and FIRES two slugs into Bingham's chest. Bingham collapses on top of Jesse. The .45 hits the floor Both men, bleeding profusely, thrash along the floor...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bud, racing toward a stairwell, LEAPS down a flight, turn and RUNS down another.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jesse, trapped under the heavy Bingham, pulls the buck kn from his holster and sinks it into Bingham's kidney. TWIS Blood POOLS. Bingham MOANS... ...Jesse rolls the big man over, hoists himself high and impales Bingham through the throat. Dead. Jesse exhales, struggles up...rising to his feet...

dialogues.speaker: BLAM
dialogues.text: out of nowhere. JESSE COLLAPSES, A BUNDLE OF TWITCHING NERVES, BLOOD POOLING FAST OUT THE BACK OF HIS HEAD... ...AND LUCIAN STANDS OVER HIM, HIS .357 SMOKING. Lucian turns slow. Toward a cracked MIRROR. Suddenly...

dialogues.speaker: INTO LUCIAN WITH THE IMPACT OF A TRUCK. BOTH HIT THE FLOO
dialogues.text: Lucian points his gun at Bud's head, who reaches for the trigger guard, shifts the barrel an inch -- A ROUND GOES

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bud flips Lucian over, rips the gun away. Lucian tries to break free. Bud grabs him - smashes the gun over and over against Lucian's face. Lucian's head BOUNCES. Eyes roll, then right. Lucian quarter rolls, then CRACKS a forearm into Bud's he Again, and Bud is knocked back with a gash over his eye.  Lucian REARS BACK and KICKS HARD into Bud's sternum. Lucian scrambles. Bud tackles him into a table, which goe down. A chair breaks. Bud lands a thunderous hook and Lucian's nose shatters. Another and his cheekbone caves. Lucian drops like a rock. Tries to crawl under another ta IN A MANIACAL RAGE, Bud flips the table and stomps down o Lucian with furious blows that come one after another. Lucian tries to cover up. BUD IS ALL OVER HIM. Grabs Luci by the throat and presses down. Lucian, fighting to breathe, digs his nails into Bud's fa tearing skin.  Bud's face twists with hate as he chokes the life out of Lucian's eyes BULGE...His mouth stretches WIDE...clutchin Bud's fingers, trying to pull away... Bud SNORTS, tightens his grip... bearing down... And at t last moment, the cop in him reemerges... Bud lets go. Lucian rolls to his side and coughs up a thick ribbon of blood and vomit. Bud slams on restraints. Bud staggers to his feet...breathing hard...Spots Jesse o the floor...And he slows... Jesse lies in shadow. Perfectly still. We cannot see his Only the dark pool of blood around him. Lucian passes out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into radio) I got him... I got Lucian.

dialogues.speaker: SLOWLY PULL AWAY AND TRACK OVER THE MASSACRE...
dialogues.text: ...as POLICE come in...over bodies and blood and guns, an the stairs and out a broken window, to the CROWDS in the street held back by POLICE, past flashing lights and emergency vehicles...  ...to where life goes on in New Orleans.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sun is out. The sky above is clear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON BUD, as he leads Lucian through the bowels of city loc Lucian - in prison garbs, haggard, dark bruises - looks u they pass a two-way mirror of an INTERROGATION ROOM, SEES

dialogues.speaker: KIERSEY
dialogues.text: ...seated, making statements to Shepard, who is taking no Stacks of Jesse's reports surround them. Bud walks Lucian past, into...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...and Lucian sits at a table. Bud across from him. Silen hangs, several moments.

dialogues.speaker: ON BUD
dialogues.text: starting again, knowing... There's something bigger. A sl smile spreads...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Want a cup of coffee?
